title: Efectuar lo acordado
desc: The Professor recruits a young female robber and seven other criminals for a grand heist, targeting the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Imprudencias letales
desc: Hostage negotiator Raquel makes initial contact with the Professor. One of the hostages is a crucial part of the thieves' plans.

title: Errar al disparar
desc: Police grab an image of the face of one of the robbers. Raquel is suspicious of the gentleman she meets at a bar.

title: Caballo de Troya
desc: Raquel is adversely affected by a personal crisis with her ex-husband. The hostages are afraid of the sound of gunshots they heard. Thieves argue among themselves.

title: El día de la marmota
desc: A sudden development in the investigation and a mistake made by one of the thieves confronts the Professor with a serious risk that could lead to his identity being revealed.

title: La cálida Guerra Fría
desc: The problems inside and outside the National Currency and Stamp Factory are growing. The biggest robbery in history does not allow any mistakes and each time, the tension and fear is rising. What opportunities are there for everything to go well?

title: Refrigerada inestabilidad
desc: A new police plan will make Raquel enter the National Factory of Currency and Stamp, right at the peak of the biggest heist in history. Berlin will be responsible for being the most extravagant host that the inspector has ever seen. What is their plan

title: Tú lo has buscado
desc: Despite the setbacks and to keep more than 60 hours locked up, the mood of the robbers does not decline. The printing of tickets can not go better, surpassing the figures that had been marked and the construction of the tunnel initiates a new phase that will facilitate the perforation. In the police tent, however, the weather has become rare after the assault on the pharmacy. Suspicion begins to settle in Raquel and Angel, both distrust each other despite having been more than partners. Neither policemen nor robbers know that a leak is being planned among the hostages...

title: El que la sigue la consigue
desc: The professor talks with Raquel's mother on stressful conditions. Darphanede wants thieves to choose between money and freedom from the hostages.

title: Se acabaron las máscaras
desc: The police finds the house where The Professor has planned everything. Tokyo and Berlin are fighting about how to proceed.

title: La cabeza del plan
desc: Tokyo is questioned by the police. The Professor and Raquel's ex-husband are getting into a fight.

title: Cuestión de eficacia
desc: The hostages are trying to execute an outbreak, while things are escalating between the robbers. Will The Professor make his call in time?

title: ¿Qué hemos hecho?
desc: Raquel is discovering the identity of The Professor. The tension inside the House of national Stamp and Currency is rising.

title: A contrarreloj
desc: The execution of the plan is in its final stages. Inspector Raquel is accused of working together with The Professor.

title: Bella ciao
desc: After confessing a long-held secret, Moscow loses his son's trust. A contingency plan to free Tokyo hits a snag, forcing her to improvise.

title: Hemos vuelto
desc: When Rio is captured, a distraught Tokyo turns to the Professor for help. Armed with a bold new plan, they reunite the team in order to rescue him.

title: Aikido
desc: The Professor recruits Martín to put his brother's plan into action and target the Bank of Spain. First step? Create total chaos.

title: 48 metros bajo el suelo
desc: Tokyo and Nairobi's efforts go drastically awry. The Professor recalls Berlin detailing how they'd steal the gold from the water-logged vault.

title: La hora del delfín
desc: Tamayo's breaches of protocol surprise the Professor. Bogotá calms Denver's anxieties. With time running out, Palermo initiates the "Flipper" plan.

title: Bum, bum, ciao
desc: The Professor shocks officials with his latest stunt, but in response, a new inspector rattles Raquel. Palermo and Nairobi get into a heated argument.

title: Todo pareció insignificante
desc: Just as Inspector Sierra orchestrates a plan to sneak a team into the Bank of Spain, the Professor and Raquel lose communication with Palermo.

title: Pequeñas vacaciones
desc: Tokyo's happiness turns bittersweet. Ángel closes in on a quarreling Raquel and the Professor. Authorities offer a multimillion-dollar reward for tips.

title: La deriva
desc: Tokyo attempts to drown her sorrows. Sierra uses personal tactics to target a vulnerable Nairobi, while Suárez continues to hunt down Raquel.

title: Game over
desc: Anger and grief heighten tensions between the group. The Professor, while in mourning, attempts to make a daring and dangerous escape.

title: La boda de Berlín
desc: Palermo shocks the group with his actions. Sierra pressures her subject to take a deal. The Professor remembers his brother's wedding.

title: Lección de anatomía
desc: The Professor's mole attempts to pass along his message to the person inside the tent. Denver's jealousy toward Mónica and Rio's friendship heightens.

title: Suspiros de España
desc: In the past, Berlin predicts that Gandía will cause problems for the operation. Sierra's interrogation of Lisboa leads to a personal revelation.

title: 5 minutos antes
desc: Denver turns to an undercover source for help. Nairobi attempts to motivate her team as the danger around them intensifies.

title: KO técnico
desc: With Nairobi held hostage, Gandía negotiates with the crew. The Professor desperately seeks a new plan to save his team.

title: Tumbar la carpa
desc: The group reels following the attack on one of their own. The Professor puts his adjusted plan in motion with the help of new recruits and Palermo.

title: Plan París
desc: The Professor, Benjamin and the others attempt to free Lisbon. Tokyo's anger threatens her faith in the plan. Sierra takes matters into her own hands.
